english.segment1: How could I not be on your side. . Now you've shown me. . What it means to be alive?. . What can I give to show you how. . Much you've changed me?. . Now I'll never be the same. . So I will act justly, love mercy. . Walk humbly with my God
english.segment2: Seasons they change and passions they fade
english.segment6: Jesus, you are always with me
english.segment7: And I'll never be the same. . Nothing can separate us from this love. . Nothing could ever stand in Your way
english.segment8: Nothing can separate us from our God. . Forever and ever You will reign
